mapper.select: select * from hm_user_set_rel where upper(set_macadd) = upper(#{set_macadd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) order by create_time asc limit 1
select * from hm_user_set_rel where upper(set_IMEI) = upper(#{set_imei,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) order by create_time asc limit 1
select * from hm_user_set_rel where upper(icc_id) = upper(#{set_imei,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) order by create_time asc limit 1
